name: StarGuardians
description:
StarGuardians! 

A Horde Mode Infinite Survival Shooter!

Trapped an a small space station, strange alien attack you endlessly. Good thing you have a trusty Pistol and Rifle! 

Strange waves are interfering with your gear! Watch out as each round yours and the enemies abilities and power change!

Hi all! 

Here is my first Hobby game! This is the earliest dev version, but it works and shows all core concepts of the game! There is nothing revolutionary here, but it is mine!

Let me know what you think, or if you have any tips!

I am not planning to update the game, but i am not aginst it either. So keep a look out!
